page.title: 19Employment around Longworth
page.content: There are not many jobs in Longworth so a lot of people have to go to work in Abingdon, Oxford or Faringdon. There are a few people who help in the shop and some work in the pubs and the school. The only places which have many people working for them are the Nurseries in Longworth and Hinton. There are two flower and tree nurseries in Longworth and one in Hinton. A couple from the village have a workshop at the bottom of their garden and make things from wood. Mostly they make wooden toys, games and instruments. Some people have part time jobs helping old people in the village and some cant find any work at all.
